Episodes.Plot: In the wake of the Cylon sneak attack, the ragtag fleet of human survivors is forced to play a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with their pursuers. Every 33 minutes, they make a jump to a new location. And every 33 minutes, the Cylons manage to find them. The pilots are on the brink of exhaustion, relying on artificial stimulants to keep fighting, and the civilians are beginning to doubt the leadership of Commander Adama and President Roslin.
Episodes.GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Connor Widdows, Nicki Clyne, Colby Johannson

Episodes.Title: Water
Episodes.Plot: Lt. Sharon Valerii wakes up soaking wet in the tool room with an explosive charge in her duffel bag. Shortly afterward, a mysterious explosion destroys all the port-side water tanks on Galactica, creating a crisis for the entire fleet. Sharon can't remember a thing, but all the evidence points to her as a saboteur. She confesses her concern to Chief Tyrol, but he can't believe she's responsible.
Episodes.GuestStars: Donnelly Rhodes, Jill Teed, Aaron Douglas, Tobias Mehler, Colby Johannson, Bill Meilen, Bodi Olmos, Luciana Carro, Terry Chen

Episodes.Title: Bastille Day
Episodes.Plot: The fleet has found a source of water, but who will take on the difficult and dangerous job of mining it from the icy planet? Commander Adama and President Roslin send Lee to the Astral Queen, a prisoner transport ship, with an offer for its inmates: Volunteer for this mission and earn "freedom points".
Episodes.GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Connor Widdows, Nicki Clyne, Colby Johannson

Episodes.Title: Act of Contrition
Episodes.Plot: After a flight deck accident kills 13 pilots and wounds many others, Kara is thrust into service as a flight instructor and ordered to turn a group of civilian pilots and academy washouts into full-fledged Viper pilots.
Episodes.GuestStars: Donnelly Rhodes, Jill Teed, Aaron Douglas, Tobias Mehler, Colby Johannson, Bill Meilen, Bodi Olmos, Luciana Carro, Terry Chen

Episodes.Title: You Can't Go Home Again
Episodes.Plot: When Lt. Kara Thrace goes missing in action after encountering a Cylon patrol while on a training mission, Commander Adama feels responsible ? especially in light of her recent admission that she blames herself for his son Zak's death.

Episodes.Title: Litmus
Episodes.Plot: When a new copy of Doral, a Cylon who had been previously exposed while serving as the Galactica's public-relations officer, sneaks aboard and blows himself up, killing three people, Commander Adama and President Roslin must finally make public the terrifying secret known only to a select few: Cylons now look like humans.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alonso Oyarzun, Nicki Clyne, Bodi Olmos, Matthew Bennett, Christina Schild, Raahul Singh, Shaw Madson, Nimet Kanji, Biski Gugushe, Morris Chapdelaine, Dominic Zamprogna

Episodes.Title: Six Degrees of Separation
Episodes.Plot: When Baltar and the Number Six who lives in his head have a falling out, she abandons him, only to surface a short while later aboard the Galactica. But now she's called Shelley Godfrey, everyone can see her, and she's telling them that she has evidence, passed on by the late Dr. Amarak, that will prove Baltar sold out the human race to the Cylons.

Episodes.Title: Flesh and Bone
Episodes.Plot: A Cylon, who calls himself Leoben, is discovered on one of the ships in the fleet. Commander Adama sends Kara to interrogate him ? or, rather, it. The Cylon tells Kara that he planted a nuclear device on one of the ships. Although she doesn't believe it, Kara passes on the warning.
Episodes.GuestStars: Christina Schild, Eric Breker, Biski Gugushe, Callum Keith Rennie, Matthew Bennett

Episodes.Title: Tigh Me Up, Tigh Me Down
Episodes.Plot: President Roslin's fears that Commander Adama is a Cylon are stoked when she learns he's making secret wireless calls to other ships. Then, to make things worse, a single Cylon raider appears near the Galactica and begins acting strangely after being damaged in battle.
Episodes.GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Kate Vernon, Robert Wisden, David Kaye, Alex Zahara, Patrick Gallagher, Malcolm Stewart, Michael Hogan

Episodes.Title: The Hand of God
Episodes.Plot: As its fuel supply dwindles, the fleet must seek out a new supply of tylium ore or risk becoming sitting ducks to any Cylon attack. A recon patrol finds an asteroid full of the fuel, but there's a catch ? the Cylons have found it first and established a heavily guarded refining plant.

Episodes.Title: Colonial Day
Episodes.Plot: When President Roslin calls an Interim Quorum of the Twelve Colonies, she discovers that democracy brings its ugly stepsisters ? politics and deadly intrigue ? to the party. Tom Zarek, the charismatic convicted terrorist, is elected as the delegate from Sagittaron and immediately proposes elections for the vice-presidency.
Episodes.GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Kate Vernon, Robert Wisden, David Kaye, Alex Zahara, Patrick Gallagher, Malcolm Stewart, Michael Hogan

Episodes.Title: Kobol's Last Gleaming (1)
Episodes.Plot: While flying a supply patrol, Crashdown and Sharon Valerii discover a bountiful planet that can support human life. Indeed, it might be Kobol, the legendary "home of the gods." The discovery prompts Commander Adama to send a ground team to investigate; it also gives new life to President Roslin's belief that she is a tool of destiny and that this discovery, like her rapidly spreading cancer, is part of an ancient prophecy.
Episodes.GuestStars: Connor Widdows, Kate Vernon, Stephen Spender, Alonso Oyarzun, Bodi Olmos, James Bell, Donnelly Rhodes

Episodes.Title: Kobol's Last Gleaming (2)
Episodes.Plot: When Commander Adama learns that Kara disobeyed orders and Jumped to Caprica on orders from President Roslin, he demands the president's resignation, with the implied threat of a military coup. Roslin refuses his demand and sparks a confrontation.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jim Shield, Alonso Oyarzun, Warren Christie, Nicki Clyne, Jennifer Halley, Leah Cairns

Episodes.Title: Kobol's Last Gleaming, Part 1
Episodes.Plot: A supply patrol discovers a hospitable planet; Baltar, Lee and Kara find themselves in an awkward triangle.

Episodes.Title: Kobol's Last Gleaming, Part 2
Episodes.Plot: As the fleet prepares to battle the Cylons for control of Kobol, the tensions between Adama and Laura explode.
